title: Trial by Consensus
outcome: Innovators unleash a real-time public forum on the peer-to-peer network, forcing Council decisions into direct citizen votes. The future of Stenograd’s governance is placed in the hands of the entire population, driving deep societal transformation.

events.description: Innovators activate a city-wide digital forum via the BCI’s peer-to-peer network, inviting every citizen to participate in open voting on Council actions and major policies.
An unprecedented surge in citizen participation crashes remaining BCI management tools. Directorate attempts to block the forum are broadcast and met with digital protests.
Council is forced to abide by forum outcomes, removing prominent members who backed restrictive policies and appointing delegates suggested in live citizen polls.
Critical policies are rewritten in real time, replacing the BCI’s centralized controls. Grassroots advocates and former 'vanished' now shape the city’s future live on public feeds.
